name: Lost Signal (Starwarscrazy12)
description: Dive into the nostalgic era of targeted marketing! Remember those old school early 2000's Advert game we all loved. the ones you would get in a cereal box, or played on your good old windows 2000 pc. well de we have a treat for you! welcome to the high tech, futuristic world of the Nokia 3310! The best and only phone you will ever need. Play cutting edge games like Snake, and snake 2, everything is possible with the Nokia 3310. (Our version) Use the Nokia to escape the snakes on the Nokia satellite. a "Team Turbo" Global Game Jam submission from: Michael Murray, Christopher McEvoy, Blaine McKeever, & Millar McIlwain. We wanted to take the theme lost and found and play with the stressed of 2000 era phone signals, holding your phone up into the air trying to find that extra bar of signal, for a chat with your mum.
